response.original_title: In the Fire of Dancing Stillness - Reflections with Vimala Thakar
response.overview: Is it possible to live a more peaceful and creative life on our planet? In a time when the state of the planet poses important questions: What is life worth to us? And what do we still consider sacred?  These questions inspired the Director  to meet the Indian mystic, philosopher and grassroots activist Vimala Thakar (1921 â€“ 2009). It was an encounter that deeply inspired and changed her life. Almost twenty years later, she researches the profound work of this fascinating woman again in the context of our time, and translates her urgent call for holistic thinking and action into a cinematic work of art.
